location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Willam Henry Wathen, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to David Wilson, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a request for the eggs of the silk worm and seeds of various plants thought to be likely to thrive in western India and believed to be easily procurable in Persia. Instructions are given for how to pack and transport them.
